title: The Murder of Roger Ackroyd
description: An alternative cover for this ISBN can be found hereRoger Ackroyd knew too much.He knew that the woman he loved had poisoned her brutal first husband. He suspected also that someone had been blackmailing her. Now tragically, came the news that she had taken her own life with a drug overdose.But the evening post brought Roger one last scrap of information. Unfortunately, before he could finish the letter, he was stabbed to death...  The sensational case that made Agatha Christie and Hercule Poirot famous.
author: Agatha Christie
